text:
Oh, the other unit members are friends of yours,
aren't they, Asakura-kun?

Eh?...Rather than just "friends of mine", we've all
been childhood friends, and from here, this is Higuchi─

Isn't it rare? There's lots of active local idols, but childhood
friends are new. Ah, but are you really childhood friends?

Ah, I'm sure you are! Let's witness their bonds of friendship
with noctchill's "Itsudatte Bokura wa" after the break!

...
The program and the questions, none of it is right.

Well then.
They wanted to see it right? Bonds of friendship.

It's easy, right?
We just have to do it like always.

Aaah～!
Then that'll be simple enough～!

Koito-chan. Do it with all your heart.
They're gonna focus on you, after all.

H-Hey...
Change the camera! Show a different girl!

Ho-, ho-, ho-taru koi...
(TL note: She's singing a folk song called Hotaru Koi)

Huh!? Not that one either! Camera!
A different girl! A different girl!
